page.title: 13A School Day
page.content: We start school at 8.55am.When we get into the class we read while Miss Wait (our teacher) does the register. When she has done the register we go to assembly.In the assembly we have a story read by the Headmaster.After assembly we go back to the class.In class we do some written work or maths.At 10.30am we have 15 minutes break.When we go back into class we normally do a different subject.At dinner time we have school dinners or packed lunch.After dinner we have half an hour break.At 1.15pm we all go in.In class some of us do art,but often different children are doing different work in the class at the same time. At 2.20pm we have another 15 minutes break.After break we sometimes do sports.At 3.30 we go home.Some people stay behind after school to do sports.
